abstract: Apple continues to push the boundaries of its Kindle book software announcing Wednesday that it will soon offer in-browser book samples.
snippet: Apple continues to push the boundaries of its Kindle book software announcing Wednesday that it will soon offer in-browser book samples.
lead_paragraph: It has been a busy week for Amazon’s Kindle division: On Monday the company announced that it would start selling new e-books that come embedded with audio and video. On Tuesday, Amazon also released a free Kindle application available for download on Google Android phones.

headline.main: Amazon to Introduce Web-Based Book Previews
